name: XLD Finance
intro: Providing financial services across emerging economies
introduce: XLD Finance is a stablecoin-based ecosystem driving financial inclusion through real-world financial services. XLD’s roadmap includes the development of both Web 2.0 and Web 3.0 projects such as its own stablecoin, a DeFi wallet, early wage access, and a simplified crypto onramp & offramp platform for crypto natives and the financially underserved.
